heroTitle: Welcome to the Art of Healing
heroSubtitle1: A space for deep healing, care, and transformation with ancestral medicines.
heroSubtitle2: Discover our upcoming ceremonies and begin your journey of self-discovery.
upcomingCeremoniesSubtitle: Join us on a journey of healing and self-discovery. Each ceremony is a unique opportunity for transformation.
preparationCtaDescription: Proper preparation is key to a profound experience. Discover our complete guide to prepare your body, mind, and spirit.
contactCommunityText: Follow us on our social networks and get in touch with us to learn more about our upcoming events.
footerText: © {{year}} El Arte de Sanar. All rights reserved.
editCeremonyDescription: Modify the details of the ceremony. Changes will be reflected immediately.
addCeremonyDescription: Add a new ceremony to the list of upcoming events.
deleteCeremonyConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this ceremony?
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the ceremony data.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is an ancestral psychoactive infusion from the Amazon, made from the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and Chacruna leaves (Psychotria viridis). For centuries, indigenous communities have used it in sacred rituals to access expanded states of consciousness, heal the body and spirit, and connect with the divine.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The brew combines the MAOI properties of the vine with the DMT from the leaves. This combination allows DMT to be active when ingested, leading to profound introspective experiences, visions, and deep emotional release. Each experience is unique and personal.
spiritualMasterDescription: More than a substance, Ayahuasca is considered a master plant, a conscious spirit that guides and teaches. It reveals our shadows, traumas, and blockages, but also our potential, our light, and our connection to the universe. The ceremony is a dialogue with this sacred intelligence.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Many find a renewed sense of purpose and clarity about their life path.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: It facilitates the release of emotional blockages and traumas, which can manifest as physical improvements.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: It expands consciousness and strengthens the connection with oneself, others, and the universe.
groupCeremonyDescription: Healing in community. The energy of the group enhances the individual experience, creating a powerful support network. Ideal for sharing and connecting.
privateCeremonyDescription: A personalized and intimate process. Designed for those seeking a one-on-one experience with the guide to address specific or very deep issues.
guidesPageSubtitle: Beings of light and love, committed to their own healing process and that of others. Our guides are the pillars of this family, trained to accompany you with love, respect, and deep wisdom on your journey of transformation.
preparationPageSubtitle: The ceremony begins long before taking the medicine. Preparation is a fundamental act of respect and opening that determines the quality of your experience. Here we guide you step by step.
preparationProcessDescription: Weeks before, you start with a specific diet and set clear intentions.
ceremonyProcessDescription: The sacred night where you connect with the medicine in a safe and guided space.
experienceProcessDescription: The journey of introspection, visions, and emotional release under the guidance of the spirit of Ayahuasca.
integrationProcessDescription: After the ceremony, we help you apply the lessons learned to your daily life.
dietSubtitle: The 'dieta' is essential to cleanse your body and make it receptive to medicine. It is recommended to start at least one week before.
mentalPrepSubtitle: Your inner state is as important as your physical diet. Cultivate a calm and open mind.
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and connect with your inner self.
intentionsDescription: Clearly define what you want to heal or understand. What is your purpose for this ceremony?
reflectionDescription: Keep a journal to write down your thoughts, fears, and hopes before the experience.
emotionalHealingDescription: Ayahuasca can bring to the surface repressed emotions. The key is not to resist. Trust the process, allow yourself to feel, cry, and release. Surrender is an act of courage that opens the doors to deep healing. You will be in a safe space to do so.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare your sacred space with these essential items.
comfortItemsList: A change of clothes for the next day
essentialsList: A personal object of power (amulet, crystal)
An open heart and a mind without expectations
loginSubtext: Enter your credentials to access your account.
loginSuccessDescription: Welcome back! You are now logged in.
googleSuccessDescription: You have successfully signed in with your Google account.

themeTabDescription: Change the application's color palette (dark theme).
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide a media URL or upload a file.
editGuideDescription: Update the guide's information. The changes will be reflected immediately.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the guide's data from our servers.
promptRegisterDescription: Create an account to save your progress, book ceremonies, and access your personal preparation questionnaire.
chatbotWelcome: Greetings, soul. I am here to guide you. How can I help you on your path of healing and self-discovery today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again in a moment.
userManagementSubtitle: View and manage all registered users in the application.
allUsersDescription: List of all users with the ability to manage their roles.
sendEmailDescription: Compose and send an email to all registered users.
chatHistorySubtitle: Review all conversations with the spiritual guide.
allConversationsDescription: Click on a conversation to see the full history.
questionnaireDescription: Your safety is our priority. Please answer these questions honestly. This information is confidential and will only be seen by the guides.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any significant medical conditions (heart problems, hypertension, epilepsy, etc.)?
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any medication (especially antidepressants or anxiolytics)?
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a history of serious mental health conditions (schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, psychosis)?
questionnaireExperience: Have you had previous experiences with Ayahuasca or other master plants?
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for participating in this ceremony?
errorRequiredDetails: Details are required if you answered 'yes'.
questionnaireSuccessDescription: Thank you for completing the questionnaire. We will review your answers.
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was a problem saving your answers. Please try again.
mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to view this page.
questionnaireResponsesDescription: This is the information provided by the user before the ceremony.
noAnswersSubmitted: This user has not submitted their questionnaire yet.
pastCeremoniesSubtitle: Each ceremony is a unique encounter of healing and transformation. Here we share some moments from our past gatherings.
